name: Tank War - Scorched World
description:
Are you ready for all-out war? Tank War - Scorched World is the game where you enter the ultimate tank battle with only one purpose, to survive and eliminate your opponents as fast as possible.

As you play Tank War - Scorched World you will see that you enter new regions where you have to use all your power in order to eliminate the enemies and complete the objectives.

Each new map comes with different villains and enemies that you have to exterminate. From other tanks to helicopters, all of them will try to put you down so you need to destroy them first to survive and win.

You will have to wisely strategize all your moves and figure out the right approach as you control your tank. Choose the angle you want to shoot at and time your attacks to deal the most damage.

Tank War - Scorched World comes with both timed and normal missions so there are many ways you can play to test your skills. With more than 20 levels to play through and lots of cool challenges, Tank War - Scorched World is offering you the ultimate tank game experience.

Do you have what it takes to win?

Features:
• More than 20 levels to play through
• Tank and weapon upgrading system
• Beautiful graphics
• Dedicated soundtrack
• Increasing challenge from each mission
